entity.name: BiobankCategory
entity.description: This is the categories of the entries commonly written in the xls file in the first column with bold letters

entity.name: BiodataType
entity.description: This is the column GWA data n= , GWA platform , GWA comments

field.name: name
field.description: the name of the biobank [in investigation the name is unique]

field.name: Institutes
field.description: Institute that are custodian of this biobank (found in xls as Institutions)

entity.name: BiobankPanel
entity.description: This is the xls column current n= , and the column Biodata from the xls is included in the fields .

field.name: Category
field.description: A. Core Biobanks, DNA available, B. Supporting biobanks (DNA not yet available)

field.name: SubCategory
field.description: For example: Population, development, birth and growth

field.name: Coordinators
field.description: One or more contact persons for this biobank
